mapper.insert: insert into sea_mytag (aid, tagname, tagdes, addtime, tagcontent) values (#{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tagdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagcontent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select aid, tagname, tagdes, addtime, tagcontent from sea_mytag
